SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view

Class GamesListViewController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.GamesListViewController
public class GamesListViewController extends Object

This class handles the UI and logic for the "Pick Game" Window in GUI. This Windows shows the User a list of all the available Games and asks him to pick the one he wants to join. Once a Game is picked, all the instances of ExistingGameListener are notified so that the GUI can act accordingly. The picked Game's gameID is saved in an inner attribute, and can be queried in response to the Listener call. When a Game is picked, the Server is immediately notified from this class, so no need to do that externally.

This Window also allows the User to create a New Game. This is handled by alerting all instances of NewGameListener.

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener(Listener listener)
      Removes an existing Listener to the List. If the Listener is not in the List, no action is performed.
      Parameters:
      listener - the Listener to remove from the List

    • notifyListeners

      public void notifyListeners(String context)
      Notifies all the appropriate Listener inside the List that the User has performed an action. Which Listeners are called changes based on the action. Currently, supports: - NewGameListener: notified if the User chooses to create a New Game - ExistingGameListener: notified if the User choose to join an existing Game.
      Parameters:
      context - a string specifying which event has been triggered
